Configuration.Name: WorldCat Local Search
Configuration.Author: Atlas Systems, Inc.
Configuration.Description: Performs a WorldCat search using a requests title, isxn or oclc number.

Setting.name: AutoSearch
Setting.Description: Defines whether the search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: WorldCatURL
Setting.Description: The URL for WorldCat Local. Do not include a trailing slash.

Setting.name: SearchPriority
Setting.Description: Defines what order priority should be used when attempting to find a field to search by when using the auto search feature. Allowed fields are title, isxn, and oclc.
